ResourceHeader.ResourceName: A visible all-sky camera at Shigaraki MU Observatory
ResourceHeader.Description: All-sky camera (Prede, Model PSV-100) placed on the roof-top of the MU Observatory at Shigaraki MU Observatory in Shiga Prefecture, Japan (34.86N, 136.11E, 385m MSL)acquires all-sky color images in jpeg format on a continuous operation basis with a time resolution of 1-min interval since 5 November 2010. Details can be found in the PDF document (http://prede.com/english/PDF/skyview_psv-100_en2.pdf).

Instrument.InvestigationName: RISH all sky camera at Shigaraki (regular operation)
